This should ensure  that the following stylesheet processing instruction is honored by  these new browser versions. For some more background you might want  to visit the following bug report:  https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=338621  --> <?xml-stylesheet type="text/xsl" href="/WebResource.axd?d=OG6ICBS3XdykvyL_wBngEtwfPZ1xqVL3SJbFznhjfEgbO7QCYjHbDfgdgnO_5IYl31FcIeZ2u_qHqs8zCgU_y6DDpKxLyAV4MxNJVxfxbqAA9wnJHfwytgbvEYfRnFp2CKySbJEfaqzaXNpSNK6oTGhGshY1&t=635319500310794128" media="screen"?> <feed xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom" xmlns:content="http://purl.org/rss/1.0/modules/content/" xmlns:media="http://search.yahoo.com/mrss/">   <title>Academic Schools</title>   <subtitle>The University of Nottingham Careers and Employability Service works closely with staff in Academic Schools to enhance the employability of undergraduate and postgraduate students and research staff</subtitle>   <link href="http://www.nottingham.ac.uk/Careers/schools/index.aspx?schoolHomepageEvents_StandardList_SyndicationType=2" />   <generator>Contensis: http://www.contentmanagement.co.uk</generator>   <id>http://www.nottingham.ac.uk/Careers/schools/index.aspx?SyndicationType=2</id>   <updated>2015-03-12T19:30:24Z</updated>   <link href="http://www.nottingham.ac.uk/Careers/schools/index.aspx?SyndicationType=2" rel="self" type="application/atom+xml" />   <entry>     <title>ACCA Competition</title>     <link href="http://www.accaglobal.com/gb/en/campaign/advantage-competition.html" />     <author>       <name>Samantha Longe Thomas</name>     </author>     <summary>ACCA are offering the chance to win \ufffd\ufffd1,300 of job interview preparation tools including vouchers for interview outifts, a personalised strengths test and a 6 month subscription to Job Test Prep. All entries will be included in a prize draw to win \ufffd\ufffd5 registration fee. To find out more follow the link.</summary>     <published>2015-03-10T16:56:00Z</published>     <updated>2015-03-10T16:53:00Z</updated>     <id>http://www.accaglobal.com/gb/en/campaign/advantage-competition.html</id>     <category term="ACCA" />     <category term="Association of Chartered Accountants" />     <category term="Competition" />   </entry>   <entry>     <title>Spotlight on Success Celebrating International Women's Day at KPMG</title>     <link href="https://forms.akkroo.com/#/events/kpmg/34469?type=preregister" />     <author>       <name>Samantha Longe Thomas</name>     </author>     <summary>In celebration of International Women's Day, KPMG Birmingham is hosting an event so you can see for yourself what a career at KPMG looks like.</summary>     <published>2015-02-26T17:10:00Z</published>     <updated>2015-02-26T16:55:00Z</updated>     <id>https://forms.akkroo.com/#/events/kpmg/34469?type=preregister</id>     <category term="Birmingham" />     <category term="International Women's Day" />     <category term="KPMG" />   </entry>   <entry>     <title>KPMG Nottingham Insight Day</title>     <link href="https://forms.akkroo.com/events/kpmg/33765?type=preregister" />     <author>       <name>Samantha Longe Thomas</name>     </author>     <summary>Take part in this event and find out more about the opportunities available in the KPMG Nottingham office. All degree disciplines welcome! Places at these events are limited so to guarantee your spot please ensure you register early.Dress code: Business casual.</summary>     <published>2015-03-03T15:04:00Z</published>     <updated>2015-03-03T14:54:00Z</updated>     <id>https://forms.akkroo.com/events/kpmg/33765?type=preregister</id>     <category term="KPMG" />     <category term="insight day" />     <category term="nottingham jobs" />     <category term="graduate roles" />   </entry> </feed>
